item.title: This is how I stream
item.description:
Background

Important Update

In a recent X post, Real-Debrid (RD) announced enhanced anti-piracy measures, which could cause some content to stop working. However, four weeks later, I’m still not experiencing any issues.

As an alternative to Real-Debrid, I’ve heard Torguard is a good option and works natively with Stremio too.

For now, I plan to continue using RD until my subscription runs out or the service stops working, then decide whether to switch to Torguard.
